title: Ep 58: Shrek Party
description:
Today's proceedings:  We go over a few reviews with a few extra tangents included.  We also have an immature fiance wanting extra food, a cop who scares a person to the point of ruining their paints, a man who decides to take "revenge" against a child, a polyamorous relationship looking to unionize, and two listeners submit a story about blocking a kid in art class, and a neighbor who doesn't respect parking spaces!  We also go over Josh's golden birthday party!   

Get your Sheesh Merch here! 

http://etsy.com/shop/Judgiespodcast 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod 

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod 

Intro Music by: Iván 

https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1 

Logo/Designs by: https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
